definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: We hope that the customer can keep this day Ping balance.
sentences.chinese: 希望我們的客戶能保持這個天枰的平衡。

sentences.english: Did that not balance the scales, even a little?
sentences.chinese: 天枰沒法平衡，哪怕是一點點的平衡呀？

definition: variant of 稱|称[cheng1], to weigh
Jie people, a tribe of northern China around the 4th century
Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/also called 水瓶座
fast matchmaking/speed dating/(coll.) (Tw) (of a couple) to be a good match
to get along well/compatible/also written 和得來|和得来[he2 de5 lai2]

the twelve equatorial constellations or signs of the zodiac in Western astronomy and astrology, namely: Aries 白羊[Bai2 yang2], Taurus 金牛[Jin4 niu2], Gemini 雙子|双子[Shuang1 zi3], Cancer 巨蟹[Ju4 xie4], Leo 獅子|狮子[Shi1 zi3], Virgo 室女[Shi4 nu:3], Libra 天秤[Tian1 cheng4], Scorpio 天蠍|天蝎[Tian1 xie1], Sagittarius 人馬|人马[Ren2 ma3], Capricorn 摩羯[Mo2 jie2], Aquarius 寶瓶|宝瓶[Bao3 ping2], Pisces 雙魚|双鱼[Shuang1 yu2]
to bewilder/to dazzle and confuse/the planet Mars
zedoary (Curcuma zedoaria), plant rhizome similar to turmeric
